title: Rowdy Roddy Piper/Lighting Bolt style typeface
content:
Hi there,

I'm assuming this is custom but am wondering if there are any fonts out there with similar characteristics that you may be able to recommend?

Thanks so much in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141023050906im_/http:/typophile.com/files/rowdy-roddy-piper-t-shirt_5998.main.jpg)
author: joesomebody

comments.content:
You can try **[In A Flash](http://web.archive.org/web/20141023050906/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-3%20%2F%20%28Freemium%29&ffam=In%20A%20Flash%20-%20Regular&fid=deee3db8968c3b44adfb8f80bf3cc907&fsize=48&text=ROWDY%20RODDYPIPER&fit=1)** free font by Walter Velez [2002] or  
 **[Shock Therapy BB](http://web.archive.org/web/20141023050906/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Blambot%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=ShockTherapy%20BB%20-%20Regular&fid=839e9152d5b2facdb4d3eb6abbbcedbc&fsize=60&text=ROWDY%20RODDYPIPER&fit=1)** by Nate Piekos [Blambot, 2008]

Another somewhat similar: CC Zzzap [http://www.linotype.com/453272/cczzzap-family.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20141023050906/http:/www.linotype.com/453272/cczzzap-family.html "http://www.linotype.com/453272/cczzzap-family.html")  
The \_Rowdy Roddy Piper\_ lettering has similarities to the famous RKO thunderbolt logo

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141023050906im_/http:/typophile.com/files/RKO_5513.jpg)
 which, AFAIK, nobody has made into a font.  
Don
